name: TLM3: Battle!
description:
The game you know from Scratch can now be played in itch.io! 

This game lets you battle 3 enemies from the TLM (The Lasagna Movie) universe, Marshmellow, Big hand, and Exeitor!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Click the enemy to give damage, thats all.

CREDITS:

Hands/Joey/Player: silverthehedgehog56 on Scratch
